annotations.description: Here’s how to make the Pain Killada, a tiki remix of the famous, Painkiller, cocktail. It’s easy to make and uses navy strength rum, Tangerine Juice, Pineapp...
annotations.title: Pain Killada - How to Make the Tiki Drink Inspired by the Painkiller & the History Behind It

textContent:
2.5 oz navy strength rum
3 oz pineapple juice
1 oz unsweetened coconut cream
1 oz cinnamon syrup
1 oz tangerine juice
garnish fresh grated nutmeg
garnish dried pineapple ring & pineapple fronds (optional)

Shake and double strain into rocks glass over crushed ice
Garnish with pineapple ring and fronds
Garnish with nutmeg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KXsvaeyKDqM
title: Pain Killada
